SESSION_ID.description: Enter your kango session id here; must start with KANGO~ (set as secret in Render Dashboard)

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Enter your number here, starting with country code E.g +233xxxxxxxx

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: GitHub token with 'repo' scope (set as secret in Render Dashboard)

TIMEZONE.description: Enter your timezone here. Example: Africa/Accra

PORT.description: Application port. Render provides this automatically; keep default

render.note: This project uses render.yaml when deploying to Render. See render.yaml for service configuration and example environment variables. For secrets (SESSION_ID, GITHUB_TOKEN), set them in the Render Dashboard rather than committing them here.
